page.title: 17School Day West Bromwich
page.content: I catch the bus at 8.40am and arrive at school about 8.45 and then walk around until the bell goes for registration at 9.0am. After Assembly at 9.30, the bell goes for first lesson which for me is Spanish. The bell goes for second lesson at 10.10 which is maths. After maths is break which is fifteen minutes long. I talk to my friends and eat crisps. Third and fourth lesson is PE and we usually have tennis, athletics or rounders. At 12.15 pm we go back to the gym for a shower and get changed. At 12.25 I go home for dinner. I have to catch a bus at 1.30pm so I will get to school for the afternoon registration at 1.40. At 1.50 the fifth lesson starts and I have treble Technical Drawing. School finishes at 3.50pm but there is homework to do. Lesley Fekete 14
